hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export PATH=$VCAP_RUBY19/bin:$PATH
RUBY19_REALPATH=`readlink -nf $VCAP_RUBY19` SQLITE_REALPATH=`readlink -nf $VCAP_SQLITE` GIT_REALPATH=`readlink -nf $VCAP_GIT` WARDEN_DEPOT=$WARDEN_INSTANCES
OAUTH2_SVC=$PWD/oauth2
TEST_RUNNER=`mktemp` cat <<-EOT > $TEST_RUNNER #!/bin/bash #set -x #set -o errexit
mkdir -p /tmp/var/vcap/store mkdir -p /tmp/var/vcap/sys/run
export PATH=$RUBY19_REALPATH/bin:$GIT_REALPATH/bin:$PATH export LIBRARY_PATH=$SQLITE_REALPATH/lib:$LIBRARY_PATH export C_INCLUDE_PATH=$SQLITE_REALPATH/include:$C_INCLUDE_PATH export CI_ENV='jenkins'
# nats expects to write in /var/vcap/sys/run sudo mkdir -p /var/vcap/sys/run sudo chown -R vcap:vcap /var/vcap/sys/run
cd /tmp/oauth2_source/oauth2
bundle install --deployment bundle exec rake spec:ci
EOT
HANDLE=`$WARDEN_REPL -e -c "create bind_mount:$RUBY19_REALPATH,$RUBY19_REALPATH,ro bind_mount:$GIT_REALPATH,$GIT_REALPATH,ro bind_mount:$SQLITE_REALPATH,$SQLITE_REALPATH,ro"`
echo "enable vcap could execute sudo without password within warden" sudo ls $WARDEN_DEPOT/$HANDLE/ssh/ssh_config set +e vcap_sudo_line="vcap ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" vcap_chk_ret=`sudo ssh -T -F $WARDEN_DEPOT/$HANDLE/ssh/ssh_config root@container cat /etc/sudoers | grep "$vcap_sudo_line"` if test -z "$vcap_chk_ret" then sudo ssh -T -F $WARDEN_DEPOT/$HANDLE/ssh/ssh_config root@container chmod 740 /etc/sudoers sudo ssh -T -F $WARDEN_DEPOT/$HANDLE/ssh/ssh_config root@container "echo \"Defaults:vcap !requiretty\" >> /etc/sudoers" sudo ssh -T -F $WARDEN_DEPOT/$HANDLE/ssh/ssh_config root@container "echo \"$vcap_sudo_line\" >> /etc/sudoers" sudo ssh -T -F $WARDEN_DEPOT/$HANDLE/ssh/ssh_config root@container chmod 440 /etc/sudoers fi set -e
$WARDEN_REPL -e -x -c " copy $HANDLE in $OAUTH2_SVC /tmp/oauth2_source copy $HANDLE in $TEST_RUNNER /tmp run $HANDLE chmod +x $TEST_RUNNER run $HANDLE $TEST_RUNNER copy $HANDLE out /tmp/oauth2_source/oauth2/spec_reports $OAUTH2_SVC vcap:vcap copy $HANDLE out /tmp/oauth2_source/oauth2/spec_coverage $OAUTH2_SVC vcap:vcap destroy $HANDLE "
rm -f $TEST_RUNNER
